title: Chinese Students in U.S. Schools (Yingyi Ma)
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: Today, we meet Yingyi Ma from Syracuse University. Yingyi recently published Ambitious and Anxious: How Chinese College Students Succeed and Struggle in American Higher Education with Columbia University Press. We discuss the challenges facing college students from China, and how to create learning environments that can help them succeed.
